# Supporting the health of aging populations  

&nbsp;

## Substantive expertise

* Concurrent progression of complex chronic conditions
  + Dementia and cognitive impairment 
  + Multimorbidity
  + Mobility limitations

* Identification of potentially modifiable risk and protective factors 
  + Comorbid chronic conditions
  + Dietary intake 
  + Food insecurity

* Cohort dynamics in population health and aging  

&nbsp;

## Methodological expertise

* General linear mixed modeling 
  + Gaussian, logit, Poisson, and ZINB distributions 
  + Multilevel modeling

* Latent variable modeling 
  + Latent growth models
  + Latent class/profile analysis

* Analysis of complex longitudinal health data 
  + Household clustered national probability samples
  + Non-random missing data

* Toolkit
  + SAS (15 years)
  + Mplus (15 years)
  + R (e.g., ggplot (10 years))

&nbsp;
